org.gbif.registry.ws.resources.legacy

Class IptResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.registry.ws.resources.legacy.IptResource

  • public class IptResource
extends Object
    Handle all legacy web service requests coming from IPT installations, previously handled by the GBRDS.

        @Inject
public IptResource(org.gbif.api.service.registry.InstallationService installationService,

    • Method Detail

      • registerIpt

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerIpt(@InjectParam
                                             LegacyInstallation installation,
                                             @Context
                                             javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext security)
        Register IPT installation, handling incoming request with path /ipt/register. The primary contact and hosting organization key are mandatory. Only after both the installation and primary contact have been persisted is a Response with Status.CREATED returned.
        Parameters:
        installation - IptInstallation with HTTP form parameters having been injected from Jersey
        security - SecurityContext (security related information)
        Returns:
        Response with Status.CREATED if successful

      • updateIpt

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateIpt(UUID installationKey,
                                           @InjectParam
                                           LegacyInstallation installation,
                                           @Context
                                           javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext security)
        Update IPT installation, handling incoming request with path /ipt/update/{key}. The primary contact and hosting organization key are mandatory. Only after both the installation and primary contact have been updated is a Response with Status.CREATED returned.
        Parameters:
        installationKey - installation key (UUID) coming in as path param
        installation - IptInstallation with HTTP form parameters having been injected from Jersey
        security - SecurityContext (security related information)
        Returns:
        Response with Status.CREATED if successful

      • registerDataset

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerDataset(@InjectParam
                                                 LegacyDataset dataset,
                                                 @Context
                                                 javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext security)
        Register IPT dataset, handling incoming request with path /ipt/resource. The primary contact and publishing organization key are mandatory. Only after both the dataset and primary contact have been persisted is a Response with Status.CREATED returned.
        Parameters:
        dataset - LegacyDataset with HTTP form parameters having been injected from Jersey
        security - SecurityContext (security related information)
        Returns:
        Response with Status.CREATED if successful

      • updateDataset

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateDataset(UUID datasetKey,
                                               @InjectParam
                                               LegacyDataset dataset,
                                               @Context
                                               javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext security)
        Update IPT Dataset, handling incoming request with path /ipt/resource/{key}. The publishing organization key is mandatory (supplied in the credentials not the parameters). The contacts are preserved from the existing dataset, careful not to duplicate contacts. Only after both the dataset and primary contact have been updated is a Response with Status.OK returned.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - dataset key (UUID) coming in as path param
        dataset - LegacyDataset with HTTP form parameters having been injected from Jersey
        security - SecurityContext (security related information)
        Returns:
        with Status.CREATED (201) if successful

      • deleteDataset

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteDataset(UUID datasetKey)
        Delete IPT Dataset, handling incoming request with path /ipt/resource/{key}. Only credentials are mandatory. If deletion is successful, returns Response with Status.OK.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - dataset key (UUID) coming in as path param
        Returns:
        Response with Status.OK if successful
